Title: Young eagles on Mount Yan
Publisher: Renmin tiyu chubanshe (人民美术出版社)
Notes: Yanshan - Mount Yan - 燕山 is a mountain range in Hebei province. The character 燕 also means 'swallow'. The Great Wall can be seen running over the mountains in the background. The text on the water tank: ?红岭小学 - ? hong ling primary school. Unfortunately the fis=rst charachter is not visible.
